title: Language Filter?
body: My language filter is off but all swearing is still star'd out? Is this a glitch or what? I've tried ckecking and unchecking the language filter box but nothing has worked? Also I was never told I got in trouble for saying anything bad I just like to curse lol? So unless Riot applies the filter as they please I am not sure how to fix this problem? Help?

replies.body: If the toggle for the filter isn't working, there's a command in-game to switch it.  Just time /chatfilter while in-game, and you should get a notification for success.  Let me know if that helps!
Have you tried disabling it in both the alpha and legacy client to see if that helps?
